WELCOME.message_en:
Hello, tourist\! üòä

I am your AI assistant for planning ideal walks around Nizhny Novgorod\. I will help you find interesting places near you and create a personal itinerary\.

üåü Are you ready to conquer the hometown of Maxim Gorky, Natalia Vodianova, Mark Edelstein and other celebrities\? Then click the "Make a walk plan" button\!

CAPABILITIES.message_en:
ü§ñ *What can I do\?\.\.\.*

Hmm, let's tell you point by point:

üìç 1 ‚Äî I'm making up a route from your current location
üèõÔ∏è 2 ‚Äî I select locations according to your interests \(history, art, sports, panoramas, and much more\)
üï∞Ô∏è 3 ‚Äî I calculate the time of the walk and create a timeline \(schedule\)
üí´ 4 ‚Äî I explain why each place is worth your precious attention :\)

Just click on "Make a walking plan" and I will prepare for you the program of your grand tour of the sunset capital\! üåÖ

INTERESTS_QUESTION.title: –í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å 1 - –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã
INTERESTS_QUESTION.message_en:
*‚ú® Step 1Ô∏è‚É£ of 3Ô∏è‚É£*

*Tell us about your interests in a free form\.* What would you like to do\? What to see while walking through the streets of the sunset capital\?

For example, you can write:
"I like music and modern art," "I love enjoying the embankments," "I love active recreation, sports\!" and the like\.

You can combine any interests\! Describe them in your own words\.
